Page.title: UPNP 设置
Page.laHeadTitle: UPNP 设置(端口自动映射)
Page.laNotice1: 数据映射端口:指设备的数据服务端口映射到外网的端口.
Page.laNotice2: Web映射端口:指设备的Web服务端口映射到外网的端口.
Page.laNotice3: 在指定模式下,只映射到指定的端口,如果端口被占用,则映射失败.
Page.laNotice4: 在自动模式下,会优先映射到指定端口,如果指定端口被占用,则自动递增映射端口,直到映射成功.

Page.title: UPNP Setting
Page.laNotice1: Data port map No.:device data port forwards to external network port.
Page.laNotice2: Web port map No.:device web port forwards to external network port.
Page.laNotice3: In specified mode, only can mapping to the appointed port, if port was occupied then mapping failed.
Page.laNotice4: In automatic mode, will mapping to the appointed port in priority; if appointed port was occupied, the mapping port will auto-increment till map successful.
